msContents.summary: Tax Register? Concerns some kind of assessment based on (landed?) property for taxation

msItemStruct.note: Both sides written transversa charta; broken top and bottom
Two fragments from a sheet which join together with little loss of text
'Verso', col. I, 45 lines, col. II, 47 lines; recto, col. I, 35 lines, col. II, 42 lines
The hand on the 'recto' is a carefully executed minuscule; that on the 'verso' is a slightly more cursive style

supportDesc.support: 1 papyrus fragment; (a) 15.8 x 17.3 cm. (b) 19.4 x 17.2 cm

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

div.ab: [verso] [col. I] through . . . ker.; through . . . potter 3 1/4 1/2 ker.; through Barsak- 1/4 ker.; through Ananias s. of Chyrtipe 16 ker.; [l. 5] through Ananias s. of Psol 1 3/4 ker.; through Menas s. of Paam 1/2 ker.; through Chyrtipe . . . ker.; hrough . . . 1 1/2 . . . ker.; through . . . 1. . . ker.; [l. 10] through . . . undertaker 14 3/4 ker.; through . . . s. of Abraamios 7 1/2 ker.; through . . . potter of small wares 1 sol. 1/2 ker.; through . . . 16 1/2 ker.; through Zacharia s. of Pne- 1 1/2 ker.; [l. 15] through David dioiketes 5 3/4 ker.; through Patermouthis manufacturer of oil 2 3/4 ker.; through Menas s. of Charesias 1 1/4 ker.; through Silas 10 1/4 ker.; through Kyriakos manufacturer of oil 3 ker.; [l. 20] through Menas son of Kanach 5 3/4 ker.; through Paam . . . 1/4 ker.; through Isak cobbler 1 ker.; through Senouthios cobbler 1/2 ker.; through children of Nonne 1/4 ker.; [l. 25] . . .; through Kalapesios . . . 1/2 ker.; through Paktouarios 4 ker.; through Theodosios s. of Ioannes 4 sol. 12 1/2 ker.; through Kollouthos son of Tapia 6 3/4 ker.; [l. 30] through children of Tamati 2 1/2 ker.; through oannes s. of Anoubas 1 sol. 1 1/2 ker.; through Azaria 1 ker.; through Menas s. of Andreas 2 1/2 ker.; through Georgios s. of Tekose 1 ker.; [l. 35] through Iakob s. of Dolia 13 1/2 ker.; through Iakob s. of Kathotas 3 ker.; through Epiphanios s. of Daimon 16 1/2 ker.; through Chatape 12 ker.; through Apa Kyri 10 1/4 ker.; [l. 40] through Pistoi Kaloe 1 1/2 ker.; through Andreas clothes-mender . . .; through Daniel s. of Panoubas 3/4 ker.; through Suai fuller 20 1/2 ker.; through Kamsos ak- 3 1/2 ker.; [l. 45] through Sampson fruit-collector 3 1/2 ker. [col. II] . . .; through . . . 10 ker.; through apa Dios Sai 10 ker.; [l. 50] through Papas Kiki 21 1/4 ker.; through Syros s. of Sai 2 1/4 ker.; through Sampson deacon 1 1/2 ker.; through . . . 10 1/4 ker.; through Tbene Amisa 20 1/4 ker.; [l. 55] through . . . 1 sol. 23 ker.; through Pask. . . 6 1/4 ker.; through Pesountis prosopos 33 sol. 19 ker.; through Anthemios Nos 3/4 ker.; through . . . 1 sol. 10 ker.; [l. 60] through Senouthios Tabitha 9 1/2 ker.; through Apa Kyri fuller 1 ker.; through Kyriakos 1 1/4 ker.; through Epiphanios the elder 1 sol. 16 ker.; through Zacharia s. of Paulos 4 sol. 19 1/2 ker.; [l. 65] through Kakeiot- . 1/2 ker.; through Isak s. of Pae- 1 3/4 ker.; through Ananias potter 6 ker.; through Ioannes son of Pamphilia 11 1/4 ker.; through Iakob, his brother . . ker.; [l. 70] . . .; through Apa Dios Tal- 3/4 ker.; through Pachoumsai 4 1/4 ker.; through slave of Petermouthios 1 1/4 ker.; through Petros from Tem - 2 1/2 ker.; [l. 75] through El. . . 1/4 ker.; through Dioskoros deacon 7 3/4 ker.; through Paulos Patselet 2 3/4 ker.; through Ioannes s. of Parnouthios 6 1/4 ker.; through Sansnos fuller 1 sol. 10 1/4 ker.; [l. 80] through Anastasios 10 1/4 ker.; through Kames . sol. 22 ker.; through Papnouthios from the church 5 1/4 ker.; through Mousaios from Philai. 2 sol. 21 1/2 ker.; through Suai son of Epiphanios 1/2 ker.; [l. 85] through Apa Kyros am- 1/2 ker.; through . . . 4 sol. 21 1/4 ker.; through s. of Sansnos 3 1/4 ker.; through Leontios 2 1/4 ker.; through Isak shepherd 4 1/2 ker.; [l. 90] through prison-warden 1 sol.; through Abram son of Sacho 4 1/4 ker.; through. . . from the church 13 1/4 ker.; through Ioannes son of Daniel 13 1/4 ker.; 94 through Symeon and another 6 1/2 ker. [recto] [col. I] [5 lines] through Menas s. of Charesias 1 1/4 ker.; through Kyriakos manufacturer of oil 3 ker.; through Isakios cobbler 1 ker.; through children of Nonne 1/4 ker.; [l. 10] through Kalapesios s. of Apa Dios 1 1/2 ker.; through Paktouarios 4 ker.; through . . .; through Kollouthos s. of Tapia 2 1/2 ker.; through Ioannes s. of Anoubas 1 sol.; [l. 15] through Azaria dealer in salt 1/4 ker.; . . .; through Iakob son of Doulia 13 ker.; through Iakob son of Kathota 3 ker.; through Epiphanios son of Daimon 16 1/2 ker.; [l. 20] through Chatape 1 1/4 ker.; through Apa Kyros Anatolios 20 1/4 ker.; through Pistoi Kalche 1 1/2 ker.; through Andreas clothes-mender 20 3/4 ker.; through Danielos son of Panoubas 3/4 ker.; [l. 25] through Souai fuller 20 3/4 ker.; through Kamsos ak- 3 1/2 ker.; through Sampson fruit-collector 3 1/2 ker.; through Konstantinos 2 sol. 1 ker.; through Kames son of Tapia 6 ker.; [l. 30] through Isakios son of Lo. . . 20 3/4 ker.; through children of 16 ker.; through camel-drivers 9 3/4 ker.; through Apa Dios Sai 10 . . . ker.; through Papas Kiki 20 . . . ker.; [l. 35] through Sampson deacon . . . 1/2 ker.; total 17 sol. 9 1/4 ker. II] [4 lines] through Kakeiot . . . ker.; through Ananias potter . . . ker.; through Ioannes s. of Pamphilia . . .; through Iakob s. of Pamphilia 1/2 ker.; [l. 45] through Apa Dios Talo- 3/4 ker.; through Pachumis 4 3/4 ker.; through Patermouthis 1/4 ker.; through Petros . . .; through Dioskoros deacon 21 1/4 ker.; [l. 50] through Paulos son of Patselet 2 3/4 ker.; through Ioannes . . . 6 1/4 ker.; through sons of Sasnos, fuller 1 sol. 12 ker.; through Anastasios 10 1/4 ker.; through Kames s. of Arres 4 sol. 20 ker.; [l. 55] through Papnouthios from the church 1 1/2 ker.; through Mousaios from Philai . sol. 10 1/2 ker.; through Apa Kyros am- 1/2 ker.; through Georgios . . . 4 sol. 10 1/4 ker.; through son of Sansnos 3 1/4 ker.; [l. 60] through Leontios port- 2 1/4 ker.; through Isakios port- . 1/2 ker.; through prison-warden 1 sol.; through rent-collector of the mill of the church 13 1/4 ker.; through Ioannes son of Danielios 13 1/4 ker.; [l. 65] through Symeon . . . 1/2 ker.; . . .; total 28 sol. 22 ker.; 46 sol. 6 1/2 . . . ker.
